metadata.title: CVE-2022-31737

platform: SUSE Enterprise Storage 7.1

metadata.description: A malicious webpage could have caused an out-of-bounds write in WebGL, leading to memory corruption and a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.10, Firefox < 101, and Firefox ESR < 91.10.
